scenarios.question: You find a locked door in an abandoned house. What do you do?
A stranger whispers a secret in a crowded room. What do you do?
You are lost in a dense forest at night. What do you do?
A painting in the gallery moves when you look away. What do you do?
You have the power to change a past event. What do you choose?
A chaotic storm approaches your city. What do you do?
scenarios.left: Go out to witness the fury.
scenarios.right: Protect the windows and take shelter.

scenarios.question: You find a wallet full of money. What do you do?
scenarios.left: Accept it as a gift from the universe.
scenarios.right: Turn it in to the police.

scenarios.question: Your friend is accused of a crime they didn't commit. What do you do?
You are offered a pill that reveals supreme truth. What do you do?
The world will end in 24 hours. What do you do?
scenarios.right: Spend the time in silent reflection.

archetypes.title: Ares
archetypes.description: The Warrior. You are impulsive, courageous, and live for action. Your strength lies in determination and the ability to face challenges head-on.
archetypes.shadow: Your aggression can become destructive. Ares' shadow side is uncontrolled fury and the inability to surrender.

archetypes.title: Athena
archetypes.description: The Strategist. You are wise, calculating, and strategic. Your strength lies in intelligence, wisdom, and the ability to plan.
archetypes.shadow: Your excessive control can lead to paralysis. Athena's shadow side is emotional coldness and isolation.

archetypes.title: Aphrodite
archetypes.description: The Seductress. You are charismatic, sensual, and connected to emotions. Your strength lies in beauty, charisma, and the ability to inspire.
archetypes.shadow: Your need for approval can become obsessive. Aphrodite's shadow side is vanity and manipulation.

archetypes.title: Apollo
archetypes.description: The Illuminated. You are creative, expressive, and a seeker of truth. Your strength lies in creativity, clarity, and the pursuit of knowledge.
archetypes.shadow: Your pursuit of perfection can become obsessive. Apollo's shadow side is perfectionism and relentless criticism.

archetypes.title: Hades
archetypes.description: The Transformer. You are introspective, mysterious, and transformative. Your strength lies in depth and the ability to deal with the unknown.
archetypes.shadow: Your isolation can become depression. Hades' shadow side is darkness, fear, and obsession with control.

archetypes.title: Hermes
archetypes.description: The Communicator. You are versatile, communicative, and adaptable. Your strength lies in communication, flexibility, and the ability to connect.
archetypes.shadow: Your superficiality can prevent deep connections. Hermes' shadow side is dishonesty and lack of commitment.
